RumorFact.Text: Solanum wants to check the time loop control panel. I might find her inside the Ash Twin Project.

ExploreFact.Text: Solanum is already here. She observing the time loop ring's logs.

Now she knows about the time loop and that our Sun will soon go supernova. Solanum wants to reach the Vessel, but she also wants to revisit her childhood places. I can try to find her on the Vessel, or somewhere else.
Last cycle, Solanum was not sure how the time loop worked. This cycle it seems like she understood everything and now wants to go to the Vessel.
Solanum just happened to pass right by the unpaired statue inside the Ash Twin Project. Now she's stuck in the time loop too.
